com.sudoplay.axion.registry

Class TagAdapter<T extends Tag>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sudoplay.axion.registry.RegistryAccessor
      • com.sudoplay.axion.registry.TagAdapter<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - Tag type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseTagAdapter, TagBooleanAdapter, TagBooleanArrayAdapter, TagByteAdapter, TagByteArrayAdapter, TagCompoundAdapter, TagDoubleAdapter, TagDoubleArrayAdapter, TagFloatAdapter, TagFloatArrayAdapter, TagIntAdapter, TagIntArrayAdapter, TagListAdapter, TagLongAdapter, TagLongArrayAdapter, TagShortAdapter, TagShortArrayAdapter, TagStringAdapter, TagStringArrayAdapter

    public abstract class TagAdapter<T extends Tag>
extends RegistryAccessor
    Classes that extend the abstract TagAdapter class define how Tags are read from and written to the underlying streams.
    Author:
    Jason Taylor

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  TagAdapter.Ext
      Group of TagAdapters that conform to Axion's custom, extended specification.
      static class  TagAdapter.Spec
      Group of TagAdapters that conform to the original NBT specification.

      • toString

        public java.lang.StringBuilder toString(Tag tag,
                               java.lang.StringBuilder out)
        Appends the Tag string to the StringBuilder given. This is the default behavior and is overridden in special cases, such as the TagList and TagCompound.
        Parameters:
        tag - the Tag to write
        out - the StringBuilder to append to
        Returns:
        the StringBuilder given

      • applyIndent

        protected java.lang.StringBuilder applyIndent(Tag tag,
                                  java.lang.StringBuilder out)
        Appends a two-space indent to the StringBuilder given, once for each non-null parent of the Tag given.
        Parameters:
        tag - the Tag
        out - the StringBuilder to append to
        Returns:
        the StringBuilder given
